channel.title: Adding Trade Option to an NPC
channel.description:
how do i add the trade option to a npc I've got the method to change name and examine info but how would i add an option for trade to the npc? heres what i got in class5:
[code=abap]IF(i == @@@@) { // NPC ID class5.aString65 = "**********"; // NPC name class5.aByteArray89 = "#########".getBytes(); // Examine description }[/code]
wat can i put to get the trade option? [317 delta]

item.title: Adding Trade Option to an NPC
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

dude thanks SO muchh rep++

item.title: Adding Trade Option to an NPC
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

class5.aStringArray66 = new String[...]; class5.aStringArray66[0] = "Attack"; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Trade"; class5.aStringArray66[2] = "And so on";

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Trade Option to an NPC
